text: George Edward Maxwell "Max" Wright (August 2, 1943 - June 26, 2019) was an American actor. He was best known for his role as Willie Tanner on the television comedy series ALF. Wright was born on August 2, 1943 in Detroit, Michigan. He was married to Linda Wright from 1965 until her death in 2017. They had two children, Ben and Daisy. In January 2000, Wright was arrested for drunken driving in Los Angeles, California. Wright had another DUI arrest in 2003. In 1995, he was diagnosed with lymphoma. He was remission until the cancer returned in early 2019. Wright died on June 26, 2019 at his home in Englewood, New Jersey from the disease at the age of 75. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1943 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from lymphoma Category:Cancer deaths in New Jersey Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Detroit
